__e: If one happens to something, then begins not simply On with his life from the beginning.
It's like he's done it all his life. He's sure not about to retire!
And if anything happens to him, it's 'cause of me.
When I think that something could happen to you, it feels bad inside. Like I might vomit.
Whatever happens to him, happens to you, and then some.
